title: Marketing: promotional strategy
creator_contributor_role: Dallas County Community College, production company
description: Episode number 3 of Series "The Business file.". Promotion is the communication element in the marketing mix. Aided by Professors Jerry DeHay and Jerome McCarthy and the example of Doritos chips from the Frito-Lay Company, Alex Burton explains the various different promotional techniques available to the marketing manager. These include advertising, personal one on one selling, publicity and sales promotions. The particular mix of these components should be assembled according to the target audience and the purpose of the promotion, whether it be to inform, persuade or remind the public of your product or service.
